ygData.subject: Re: Possible Spoiler - Unverified
ygData.msgSnippet: If it s true its a rare drop... I talked to someone who was at the mines killing the Hero.. He said he had killed Meldrath a number of times and I asked if he
ygData.messageBody:
If it's true its a rare drop... I talked to someone who was at the mines
killing the Hero.. He said he had killed Meldrath a number of times and I
asked if he dropped a book or anything, he said he dropped only money each
time. But, I could not confirm myself. I still believe the book isn't out
there and those that made the fishing pole and animated bait had inside
information. I expect that the problem is with the gnomish fireworks and
when the appropriate patch is made, the third book will appear, perhaps
even at the windmills.

At 05:50 PM 10/11/1999 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "kale eusi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>Was emailed a possible spoiler about the rumored missing 3rd book today.
>The email claimed that "Meldrath" drops the book we've all been looking
>for. I am unable to verify because I'm at work.
